dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is used for classification tasks, where each input is an 8x8 image represented by a list of 8 integers between 0 and 255, coding the columns marked with 1 in the binary representation where a point is drawn.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:description: The digits dataset from sklearn is used for digits classification, where each datapoint is an 8x8 image of a digit transformed into binary values.
dcterms:title: Digits dataset (from sklearn)
